text: 24:20 Ua Me Ini 21:23-25; Godɨn Araziba 19:21; Matyu 5:38A gumazir igharazimɨn agharim apɨrightɨ, ia uaghan an agharim apɨrigh. A gumazir igharazimɨn damazim gasɨghasɨghtɨ, ia uaghan an damazim gasɨghasɨkigh. A gumazir igharazimɨn atariba apɨrightɨ, ia uaghan an atariba apɨrigh. Gumazir manam bizim gamua, gumazir igharazim gasɨghasɨki, eghtɨ ia arazir kamra uam a ikaragh.
